::Repressor/Zardus::

Repressor growls, looking at Lady Hawk. The femm was serioustly 
starting to annoy him.

"Enough," he says, "We both knwo that as soon as you get to stretch 
your wings, you'll fly away as fast as you can."

He raises his missile launcher, the weapon aimed at Lady Hawk. "We 
march untill Zardus gets settled in and sends a shuttle. Now go. 
Forward at a steady pace."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zardus flies up to the section of the Alliance base that contained 
the cargo holds, a blast door sliding aside to let the Alliance 
leader enter. He walks down a hallway, heading for a particular 
storage room.

The constant recent battles had showed that the Alliance was getting 
more and more enemies, and to counter they could use more troops, and 
Zardus had a soldier in mind. He would get this bot, and afterwards 
he would get a few bodyparts from the late Feline, and clone her.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk looks upon Repressor with an angry stare. "I prefer to 
move on my
> own wings thank you." It was bad enough that a former member of 
royalty was
> demoted to a peeon scientist, now she was being treated like a 
common
> criminal.
> 
> "A hawk...." replied Najah at Ldy Hawk mimic an amazing tone "Do you
> really though that you're a parrot... anyway a parrot would be a
> greaat beast mode to you"
> 
> Lady Hawk thought for a moment, A parrot would be a great beast 
mode. Just
> not for her.  Now she wasn't getting any respect at all. it was bad 
enough
> to be treated as a criminal, now she was being mocked by a belly 
crawler.
> "Look you low level, belly crawling sand sucking overgrown worm It 
is
> advisable to treat me with a little more respect or you will end up 
dinner
> for a carnivore." She'd take crap from Zardus but not from a 
reptile like
> Najah.
